anybody have a working dual-head setup u: assuming you installed fglrx-control, that should work
aticonfig --resolution=0, (then the resolutions for the primary display comma delimited)
Now this is just a guess
aticonfig --resolution=1, (then the resolutions for the secondary display comma delimited)
Failing that, go into /etc/X11/xorg.conf and manually edit the resolutions ^_^
I got lucky that the system I have the dual head on has two identical LCD's
DRI is a bit beyond my ken
I just pretty much do an install of the xorg-xserver-ati drivers and then fglrx-control and then run aticonfig with the changes I need to make when I set up a video card
